text: Ermionida () is a municipality in the Argolis regional unit, Peloponnese, Greece. The seat of the municipality is the town Kranidi.Kallikratis law Greece Ministry of Interior The municipality has an area of 421.118 km2. ==Municipality== The municipality Ermionida was formed at the 2011 local government reform by the merger of the following 2 former municipalities, that became municipal units: *Ermioni *Kranidi ==Province== The province of Ermionida () was one of the three provinces of Argolis Prefecture. It was abolished in 2006. Its territory covered the territory of the present Ermionida municipality. ==References== Category:Municipalities of Peloponnese (region) Category:Populated places in Argolis Category:Provinces of Greece
title: Ermionida
